Group Income
ABOUT GROUP INCOME

On a mission to ensure basic income security for everyone.

Group Income is an open-source project of the okTurtles Foundation, a non-profit organization that supports beneficial decentralization technologies.

Open Protocol

Group Income is built on top of an open protocol, and Group Income itself is 100% open-source (both the frontend and the backend). This means anyone can inspect our code, and anyone can create their own version of Group Income that interacts with ours.

Decentralized

Group Income is decentralized through federation. This means anyone can run a Group Income server themselves (if they want), and their users will still be able to interact with other users of Group Income, even across independently operated servers.

End-to-end Encrypted

Enjoy a safe and private environment to support your community with Group Income. All your chats and group interactions are protected by state-of-the art end-to-end encryption.

Community

Want to stay in the loop? Check the best way to get involve and get up-to-date.

  • Check and contribute on our code on Github.
  • Join our Slack conversations.
  • Check Group Income and Basic Income on Reddit.
  • Read our thoughts on the Blog.
  • Follow us on Twitter.
  • Connect on the Fediverse.
  • Check our videos on YouTube.

okTurtles Foundation

okTurtles Foundation is a 501(c)(3) non-profit. Our research, education, and development efforts go to supporting beneficial decentralization technologies. Our work has been covered in TechCrunch, VICE, Engadget, and elsewhere on the web.
